long_description: Made for larger smartphones, the E-Case eSeries 9 Case with Jack protects your phone from the elements, while the waterproof headphone jack lets you take advantage of all your phone's audio features. Built-in jack adds waterproof, 4-pole audio capability to devices of the same dimensions as the standard 9 case. Headphone jack allows you to adjust the volume or answer a call with the controls on your earbuds. Die-cut lash points let you tether the case to your jacket, pack or PDF for security on any adventure. Ultra-clear urethane windows allow full use of touchscreens, cameras and voice functions. Each case is individually tested to meet the IPX7 standard of withstanding submersion in 1m of water for 30 min. One-step, waterproof SealLock(TM) zipper and rugged welded seams help ensure protection from the elements. The E-Case eSeries 9 Case with Jack features PVC-free materials and UV-resistant windows.
short_description: Made for larger smartphones, the E-Case eSeries 9 Case with Jack protects your phone from the elements, while the waterproof headphone jack lets you take advantage of all your phone's audio features.
